abstract: The idea of managing little bits of power to accrue big savings in data centers is one of the powerful themes in enterprise computing.
snippet: The idea of managing little bits of power to accrue big savings in data centers is one of the powerful themes in enterprise computing.
lead_paragraph: The rapid growth in data centers, some with hundreds of thousands of computer servers attending to tasks as diverse as managing complex physics problems and posting pictures to Facebook, has led to a lot of worries about power consumption. A recent census of the industry indicated electricity use will grow by 19 percent just in 2012.
